intro: Porterandia grandifolia, commonly known as the large-flowered porterandia, is a species of flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. Its showy, bell-shaped flowers are usually pink or white, blooming in late spring to early summer. Porterandia grandifolia thrives in acidic, well-drained soils and is often found in woodland habitats.
